text:
❗Masks😷 must be worn indoors at all times, regardless of State/County mandate.

❗If certain employees cannot wear a mask for health reasons or other legally protected reasons, please talk to the HR representative to see if there is an alternative solution, such as telecommuting or wearing a face shield with a drape.
